name: Mini Street Racer - 4 player
description:
They said it couldn't be done, they said it shouldn't be done, but we did it anyway. Four players racing live on one device.

Can you handle the challenge?

5 different tracks, 4 cars, 4 players, and a bucket load of fun.

Challenge your friends to race along each different track. But don't fall too far behind, or you will drop out of the game.

Select the number of laps, and how many players, then go!
